subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The two best teams in the East and perhaps in the N.H.L., the Rangers and the Bruins, played Saturday for the first time this season and it was razor close from start to finish.
snippet: The two best teams in the East and perhaps in the N.H.L., the Rangers and the Bruins, played Saturday for the first time this season and it was razor close from start to finish.
